result.execSummary:
The defendant Robin Eugene Edley was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
03:55 PM Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in court with attorney Christian J Ness.  Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  State recites the agreement, all parties agree.  Court reviews the Revocation Order and Warrant.   State makes statement.   Attny Ness makes statement.   DEF makes statement.     Court follows agreement.  

COURT:  12 years prison:  6 years initial confinement.   6 years extended supervision.    Conditions of supervision:   Complete all terms by department.    Any unpaid court obligations are to be converted to Clerk of Court collect and civil judgment will be entered.    152 days credit.
Plea/sentencing hearing on February 8, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  10:13 AM  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Atty Bachman would enter a plea to count 1 - Jt. recommendation as to plea.  Court questions defendant as to plea questionnaire.  State makes stmt - nothing received from the victim's mother.  Court finds victim rights have been met.  Court continues to address the defendant.  Defendant entered plea of no contest to count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty count 1 and dismissed and read -in count 2.  State argues sentencing - victim A.M.T.  Atty Bachman argues sentencing.

COURT:  Sentence w/held probation 5 years - 1 year county jail  with huber credit for 68 days time served- undergo and comply with any assessments DOC may impose - no contact with A.M.T. - to sign up and  comply with sex offender registry requirements - DNA sample and surcharge $250.00 - costs to be paid during probation - comply with any and all conditions DOC may impose -

Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Sgt. Nicholas Al-Moghrabi sworn/testifies. DA Poquette: direct. Identifies DEF. Mr Bachman: no questions. Probable cause found. Bind over for arraingment. Parties have no issue with Judge-elect John Yackel hearing the case or a visiting Judge. Arraignment scheduled for August 11, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in court with attorney John Charles Bachman appeared by phone.  Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in custody by video.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 09:15 am.

Defendant Robin Eugene Edley in court, in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def correct DOB: 7/15/1987 - needs to be changed on complaint.    Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.   Bond Continues.    Public Defender to have attorney appointed.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
